_header: Quhirl [whorl? whirl?] in the queue go lightly
_description: Proverbial sayings — one couplet with Latin equivalent: ‘Gira in algore leniter / Quum fui juvenis ita feci’

BLSl1210.Transcription:
Qworle in tho qwew go lyghtlyQwene I was a ȝong man so dyd
                    I
BLSl1210.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 2.40.
